import React from 'react' import { Navbar,Container,Nav,NavDropdown,NavLink } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {useSelector,useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import {logout} from '../actions/userAction' const Header = () => { const userLog=useSelector(state=>state.userLog) const {userInfo}=userLog const dispatch=useDispatch() function handleLogout(){ dispatch(logout()) } return ( E-shop Cart
{userInfo?( Profile logout ):(   Signin )}
) } export default Header
